meta_title: WA Mining Safety Regulations: Maintenance Compliance Guide (2026)
meta_description: Master the Work Health and Safety (Mines) Regulations 2022. Learn how Factory AI builds a digital chain of evidence for maintenance compliance and DEMIRS
title: Western Australia Mining Safety Regulations Maintenance: The Definitive Guide to Digital Compliance
keyword: Western Australia mining safety regulations maintenance

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Western Australia Mining Safety Regulations Maintenance: The Definitive Guide to Digital Compliance

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, cinematic wide shot of a modern mining processing plant in Western Australia. In the foreground, a diverse group of three mining professionals (an Engineering Manager, a Maintenance Superintendent, and a Technician) are standing safely on a walkway. They are wearing full PPE including orange high-visibility shirts with reflective strips, hard hats, and safety glasses. The Technician is holding a rugged tablet, showing the back of the device (no screen visible). In the background, large industrial conveyor belts and crushing equipment are visible, with a subtle digital overlay or "digital twin" wireframe effect on one of the machines to symbolize the "Digital Chain of Evidence." The lighting is golden hour, suggesting a 24/7 operation. The image conveys safety, technology, and industrial scale. No text in the image.
